page.title: 07Industrial Estate, Alcester
page.content: The Arden Forest Industrial Estate is not very large and the factories are not very big. There are 31 factories and the number of people employed ranges from 150 to one man who works by himself. He is working up his own business. The average number of people employed is 32. All the factories together employ 1054 people, many of them from Alcester.Some of these work in their own homes, being employed as outworkers. Many of the units are light engineering works, but a few are storage depots or give a service of some sort. There are areas of wasteland round the factory estate which will probably be built on one day. We saw a factory being built from prefabricated materials and it seemed to take no time to erect.
